commit.message:
Merge #122

122: Use rustc-hash crate r=matklad a=mominul

Replace std's HashMap, HashSet with FxHashMap and FxHashSet.

Closes #121 

Thanks!

Co-authored-by: Muhammad Mominul Huque <mominul2082@gmail.com>
